manual.text: Virtuoso Schematic Editor Spectre and Ultrasim Interface User Guide
manual.description: Describes how to use the Virtuoso Schematic Editor Spectre and Ultrasim interfaces. Providing a solution to netlisting and gives a batch and scripting solution for automating various tasks.
